639940.name: Willy-Nilly Knight - Collector's Expansion Pack
639940.description:
The Willy-Nilly Knight - Collector's Edition contains 5 digital extras.

Digital OST

* Original soundtrack from Willy-Nilly Knight game as .wav file.

Digital Images

* Main splash-screen: 2048x2048 + 1920x1080
* 4 slides from game intro: 1920x1080.

Digital Artbook

* The key art from Willy-Nilly Knight game performed as print-ready electronic book on 34 hand-painted sheets.

Digital World Map

* A high-resolution version of Sambria kingdom map.

Digital Stickers

* 4 digital ready-to-print stickers with game characters.


Once installed, Collector's Edition extras can be found in "DLC_Content" folder inside your Willy-Nilly Knight installation folder.
